Title: The Crush
Actors: Cary Elwes, Alicia Silverstone, Jennifer Rubin, Kurtwood Smith
Plot: Nick Eliot, a 28 year old newspaper reporter moves in the guest house of the Forresters'. Everything goes fine until he meets Adrienne, the Forresters' only child, a 14 year old girl. She develops a crush on him. When he ignores her advances, she's rebuffed and willing to kill him.
